title: [Large-scale] Instructional Design to Enhance Acceptance and Intention to Use Weblog Learning Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning environments utilizing subject-specific weblogs in scientific fields

learning_goals: Learners can understand the functional characteristics of weblog systems and utilize them according to learning objectives.
Learners can evaluate the utility of weblog systems by applying the task-technology fit model.
Learners can explain the process of analyzing weblog usage intentions based on the theory of planned behaviour.
Learners can present the impact of technology optimism on system acceptance through case studies.

resources: Sample Weblog Dataset for Science Education

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
